txt.en: Roots of Fangorn: Slaves of the Spider Queen

An ancient evil has burrowed its way beneath the roots of the forest of Fangorn, using labour provided by a band of enslaved Orcs. The leader of these Orcs is Fr没shkul, and he must be defeated if you are to reach the spider queen and prevent the roots of the forest above from being poisoned and corrupted.
To earn this deed, you must defeat Fr没shkul.
